title: Golden Age of Video Games - Full Torrent Collection
description:
This is the full torrent collection for the Golden Age of Video Games rom / ISO / emulators collection.

What is the Golden Age of Video Games? Well, I spent over ten years researching and playing full game collections (over 10,000 games) of previous generations of video game systems to create a collection that I feel represents the "golden age of video games". With this collection, posterity may now play a nearly comprehensive collection of the best classic games (even the obscure ones) without tons of research or sorting through full ROM collections that are 90% crud.

Note that due to size, the Sega Saturn and Playstation games of the collection are NOT included in the torrents. However, they are listed in the Documentation folder of the Emulators torrent so that you can attain them in other ways.

Note also that this particular torrent contains only other torrents that each allow you to download the a particular sub-collection of the games themselves.

For questions, updates, and ongoing discussion, please refer to this forum thread - https://forum.demonoid.ph/index.php?topic=2944.0

Lastly, please seed and thanks!
